mapper.select: select id, email, content, created_at, modified_at from post order by created_at desc
mapper.insert: insert into post(email, password, content, created_at, modified_at) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{content}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select id, email, content, created_at, modified_at from post where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update post set content=#{content}, modified_at=now() where id=#{id}
